name: Mount Mage
description:
My submission to Mini Jam 52!

This was my first Mini Jam and the first time I've made a game in under 72 hours, so it may be unpolished in some areas.

I loved the limitation of only being able to use WASD and arrow keys, it really drove me to be even more creative than usual. I also think it made me produce my best game yet! I learnt so much making this game, mainly on the programming end, and it has given me a lot more confidence in what I'm capable of doing. 

I really enjoyed making the spell system and I think this has the most growth potential, I can definitely see it in a more open world type game. 

If I had a little bit more time I would have added some music and sound effects, but I felt those were the least necessary when it came to making a game in such a short amount of time. 

I really enjoyed working with these art assets, they really helped me express my creativity. I did a little bit of the art (the not so great part), but if you're interested in getting the art used they are:

- 7SOUL’S RPG GRAPHICS – ICON PACK

- FANTASY RPG TILESET PACK

- MONSTERS TIME FANTASY RPG SPRITE PACK

- OVER 80 RPG CHARACTERS WITH ANIMATIONS

Thank you so much for playing!

Please leave some feedback as I am always striving to improve!
